I gotta agree to disagree with the two people who decided to respond to my comment. In terms of the “role reversal”, if you like it as a happy ending, that’s fine, as I said I ain’t throwing shade to people who like it. I’m just personally not a fan of femdom. Too the guy who said it’s the best LO of the year so far...I really have to disagree, while the latter half of this year has been quite lacking imo, I personally much prefer last months issue to this one. Obviously it’s porn and very subjective, more power to you if you found this edition to be fantastic, By all means enjoy it. Personally, I thought last months editions was spectacular. So many top tier artists like Chiguchi Miria, Highlow, Maeshima Ryou, Misao, the list of popular artists in 09 actually outnumbered the new/lesser known artists, which is pretty rare. For real though, it’s personal preference, I ain’t got a problem if you like this edition. See y’all next month.
Don't you feel a little bit older when a new issue of Comic LO gets released?

@DoujinsRLove I don't really see it as role reversal, I see it as giving a happy-ish ending to a loli-bondage story. I think those get awfully depressing if the girl just gets degraded for the entire story
Yeah, this month is average for me, 5/10, some felt rushed and the FFM which i love, were not good but not bad either, i love the loli pussy sandwich stuff EHEHE take care oniisans

The months edition is pretty average imo, like 5-6 outta 10. Some solid authors and solid art, but I think a number of the potentially fantastic stories to be lacking. Whether cause it’s short, the sex is just “generic” (I.E limited positions or lacking viewing angles, etc), or in the case of the multiple stories with FFM, focusing too much on one girl over the other. On a more personal note as well, Am I the only one disappointed by mayfufu’s (pg61-96) role reversal in the latter half of their story ?  Obviously some people are into that and I ain’t throwing shade if you are. But I legit want to know if anyone else is more “dominant” like I am, and was thus kinda disappointed with the role reversal.
No offense to the dude who put the ToC in the comments...but there’s always a table of contents in the book lol, just look at the end, even has their names in English.
Finally another good one compared to the past few months updates...
